sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_REGISTER_MESSES(
THE_UNIT, REGISTER_TIME, PLACE, FOUND_UNIT, FIND, POST, CONTENT,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values(
#theUnit#, #registerTime#, #place#, #foundUnit#, #find#, #post#, #content#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_REGISTER_MESSES SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_REGISTER_MESSES.THE_UNIT AS theUnit, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.REGISTER_TIME AS registerTime, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.PLACE AS place, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.FOUND_UNIT AS foundUnit, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.FIND AS find, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.POST AS post, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CONTENT AS content, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.HIDDEN_TYPE AS hiddenType, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.THREE_COLOR_FORM AS threeColorForm, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.MEASURE AS measure, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_ID AS correctivePeople_Id, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE AS correctivePeople, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_UNITS AS correctivePeopleUnits, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_NAME AS correctivePeopleName, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.DEADLINE AS deadline, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTION_REPORT AS correctionReport, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.COMPLETION_TIME AS completionTime, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.FOLLOW_UP AS followUp, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.STATE AS state,
TB_REGISTER_MESSES.ID AS id, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.STATUS AS status, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CREATED AS created, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.UPDATED AS updated, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_REGISTER_MESSES where TB_REGISTER_MESSES.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_REGISTER_MESSES
THE_UNIT=#theUnit# REGISTER_TIME=#registerTime# PLACE=#place# FOUND_UNIT=#foundUnit# FIND=#find# POST=#post# CONTENT=#content# HIDDEN_TYPE=#hiddenType# THREE_COLOR_FORM=#threeColorForm# MEASURE=#measure# CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_ID=#correctivePeople_Id# CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE=#correctivePeople# CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_UNITS=#correctivePeopleUnits# CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_NAME=#correctivePeopleName# DEADLINE=#deadline# CORRECTION_REPORT=#correctionReport# COMPLETION_TIME=#completionTime# FOLLOW_UP=#followUp# STATE=#state#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_REGISTER_MESSES.THE_UNIT AS theUnit, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.REGISTER_TIME AS registerTime, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.PLACE AS place, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.FOUND_UNIT AS foundUnit, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.FIND AS find, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.POST AS post, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CONTENT AS content, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.HIDDEN_TYPE AS hiddenType, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.THREE_COLOR_FORM AS threeColorForm, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.MEASURE AS measure, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_ID AS correctivePeople_Id, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE AS correctivePeople, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_UNITS AS correctivePeopleUnits, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTIVE_PEOPLE_NAME AS correctivePeopleName, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.DEADLINE AS deadline, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CORRECTION_REPORT AS correctionReport, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.COMPLETION_TIME AS completionTime, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.FOLLOW_UP AS followUp, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.STATE AS state,
TB_REGISTER_MESSES.ID AS id, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.STATUS AS status, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CREATED AS created, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.UPDATED AS updated, TB_REGISTER_MESSES.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_REGISTER_MESSES WHERE TB_REGISTER_MESSES.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REGISTER_MESSES WHERE TB_REGISTER_MESSES.STATUS = '1'
